description1: Revolutionary video search with VisionMatrix's proprietary multimodal system. Searchvideos by people, objects, actions, and events using text, speech, images, and more.Seamlessly integrated with smart recording hardware for a connected experience.
description2: Unlock the Power of Multilingual Communication with SpeechWizard
description3: A free, fair, convenient and integrated capture-and-search experience: captured from various types of devices and search for people, behaviors, objects or places etc. of interests among different social networks.
description4: The portable camera called SearchCam provides user with acapture-and-search experience any time and any place. User easilywears the product onto the cloth. By just one press, SearchCamcaptures people, object or environment in front of the user, andsearches forsimilar occurrences on multiple social network platformsautomatically. The product can be either an instant social networkingattachment or a portable field investigation tool.
